title: Cougars earn weekend split
text:

The Assiniboine Community College women’s hockey team split its exhibition Manitoba Women’s Junior Hockey League games on the weekend. 
Katie Zacharias had a goal and an assist with Karissa Haney supplying the other marker as ACC closed out its weekend with a 2-0 win over the Polar Ice on Sunday. The Cougars fell 5-0 to the Northern Stars on Saturday. Please subscribe to view full article. 
Already subscribed? Login to view full article.
